meanings.sent1: The extemporaneous speech was delivered confidently by the student.
meanings.sent2: She gave an extemporaneous response to the unexpected question.
meanings.sent3: The extemporaneous joke he made caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her extemporaneous decision to take a different route paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The extemporaneous dance performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Improvised or done on the spot
meanings.sent1: The extemporaneous skit at the talent show was a hit.
meanings.sent2: He came up with an extemporaneous solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: The extemporaneous picnic turned out to be a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her extemporaneous painting captured the essence of the moment.
meanings.sent5: The extemporaneous decision to go on a road trip led to unforgettable memories.
